description:
This dress is sure to win the award for the comfiest one in the closet. It's made of a super-soft polyester and Lyocell knit that's both flowy and stretchy. Drirelease® technology migrates moisture off your body and dries quickly, making this an ideal travel piece.

  • Made of soft and flowy Drirelease® jersey that uses natural fibres to wick sweat and synthetic fibres to dry quickly
  • Lots of spandex and 4-way stretch for room to stretch and move
  • 2 side hand pockets
  • Antimicrobial finish prevents odours
  • Front and back length is 94cm
name: Indyeva Leveza Dress - Women's
